title: (x) Travis' The Invisible Band - ITC Avant Garde Gothic Alternates {Stephen}
content:
Will - This is [Avant Garde](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000304/http:/www.myfonts.com/FontForums/read.php?f=5&i=1733&t=1728) with alternates.   
   
Stephen
author: scoles

comments.content:
Though it's listed in their FontBook, I can't   
find the alternates and ligatures at fontshop.com.   
What I did find from Google was [Scangraphic's page](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000304/http:/www.scangraphic.de/sc-avant.htm).   
   
I'd also give FontShop a call and see if they   
are still selling it. Would be interested to hear   
what you find out. Thanks.   
   
Stephen
